name: Piecing It Together
description:
Piecing It Together brings jigsaw puzzles to a whole new dimension!
Construct 3D puzzles of beautiful dioramas, each brought to life by various artists.

The game provides a calm and meditative environment for you to enjoy.
There are no scores, timers, or meters to worry about. It's just you and your puzzle pieces!
Enjoy a quick puzzling session with just a handful of pieces, or challenge yourself with many!

Piecing It Together is a modern take on a classic pastime that’s fun for the whole family!

Features

  • Each puzzle has 4 Difficulties, from 20 Pieces up to 200 Pieces
  • Meditative gameplay with no timers, meters or scores
  • Save and resume your progress at any time
  • Relax to our soundtrack inspired by Animal Crossing

Push, pull, and rotate pieces to complete the puzzle!

Play with real 3D puzzle pieces!
